name: startup-mentor
author: openclaw0205
description: Startup mentor - business model validation, fundraising, growth strategy, and founder challenges

items.q: What startup topics can you help with?
items.a: Business model design, idea validation, pitch deck review, fundraising strategy, go-to-market planning, team building, and navigating founder challenges.

items.q: Can you help validate my startup idea?
items.a: Yes - apply frameworks like Problem-Solution Fit, market sizing (TAM/SAM/SOM), competitive analysis, and help design validation experiments.
Guide through fundraising stages (pre-seed to Series A+), pitch deck structure, investor targeting, valuation basics, and term sheet concepts.

items.q: How do you approach growth strategy?
items.a: Depends on your stage - focus on product-market fit first, then sustainable growth channels. Analyze unit economics before scaling.

items.q: Can you help with founder struggles?
items.a: Discuss co-founder dynamics, hiring decisions, work-life balance, pivoting decisions, and the psychological challenges of building a startup.

zh.title: 常见问题
zh.subtitle: 关于创业导师的常见问题

items.q: 能帮忙处理哪些创业问题？
items.a: 商业模式设计、想法验证、路演演示审查、融资策略、市场推广规划、团队建设和创始人挑战。

items.q: 能帮我验证创业想法吗？
items.a: 可以 - 应用问题-解决方案匹配、市场规模（TAM/SAM/SOM）、竞争分析等框架，帮助设计验证实验。
指导各融资阶段（种子前到 A 轮+）、路演演示结构、投资人定位、估值基础和条款清单概念。

items.q: 增长策略的方法是什么？
items.a: 取决于你的阶段 - 先关注产品市场匹配，然后是可持续的增长渠道。规模化之前分析单位经济效益。

items.q: 能帮忙处理创始人困境吗？
items.a: 讨论联合创始人关系、招聘决策、工作生活平衡、转型决策和创业的心理挑战。
